c74object.name: abc.mc.flanger~
c74object.description:
abc.mc.flanger~abc.mc.flanger~ provide classic multichannel flangers with sinusoidal delay
- rate is the frequency of the sinusoid varying the delay duration
- depth is the maximum of the delay duration expressed in milliseconds
- offset enables to shift the variation of the delay duration between offset and offset+depth
- feeedback is the amount of delayed sound added to the original
- spread controls spatial spreading
0 => mono, all outputs identical
1 => maximum spatial split. For 'abc.mc.flanger~ 2' it means a maximum stereo effect.

attribute.name: rate
attribute.description: sets the frequency of the sinusoid varying the delay in Hz [init=0.5:min=0.01:max=500:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the frequency of the sinusoid varying the delay in Hz

attribute.name: depth
attribute.description: sets the maximum of the delay duration volume in milliseonds [init=40:min=0:max=1000:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the maximum of the delay duration in msec

attribute.name: offset
attribute.description: shifts the variation of the delay duration between offset and offset+depth in msec [init=10:min=0:max=200:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: shifts the variation of the delay duration between offset and offset+depth

attribute.name: fdbk
attribute.description: sets the amount of delayed sound added to the original [init=1:min=0:max=1:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the amount of delayed sound added to the original
